Class Jumper

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Collision
          Enemy
              Jumper

public class Jumper
extends Enemy

A walking/jumping type enemy. Walks for 50 to 200 acts in a random direction. At end of move time, leaps into the air and lands. Then waits for 50 to 200 acts until next move sequence.

Version:
Jan 13
Author:
Jerry Xu
